data.title: St. Stanislaus College: St. Louis Bay, Mississippi, USA
data.text:
Searching for American boarding schools for boys? Saint Stanislaus in St. Louis Bay, Mississippi is a Catholic day and boarding school for boys in grades seven through twelve. We are located just an hour’s drive from the cultural offerings of New Orleans, on the picturesque Gulf of Mexico coastline. We welcome students from across the United States and around the world. Our stunning beachfront campus is an unrivaled outdoor lab for our marine science program. From sailing to SCUBA, our moderate climate means that students can get on the water year-round. The residency program at Saint Stanislaus sets us apart from other Catholic schools in the region, welcoming students from across the United States and around the world. Resident students enjoy a college-style campus with structure that fosters self-discipline. Athletics: Fall Swimming, Football, Soccer, Basketball,

Supporting your child’s international learning journey

We provide the advice you need to make the best educational decisions for your children and help you choose the right boarding school in England, the UK, Switzerland, Europe, Canada and the US.

Give Your Child The Best Possible Opportunities In Life

Consultation, schools guide, questions and answers about finding a school in the UK, Switzerland, Europe and America. Everything from identifying your specific family and childrens’ requirements, academic, language and extracurricular requirements to evaluating the school’s mission and philosophy, curriculum, and student achievements.

We help in the full process and in multiple school interviews and applications.

Our team of education consultants will guide you in the right direction to gain entry into a right school.
